SeriesInfo.Name: Other Messages of 2007
SeriesInfo.TagLine: Message given in 2007 that are not part of a series.

Message.Name: Our Savior's Heart
Message.Speaker: Don Patterson
Message.ExtraInfo: This is the second of a pair of messages on John 17. The first was not recorded.

Message.Name: STORM
Message.Speaker: Don Patterson
Message.ExtraInfo: A look at dealing with bad events in our lives taken from the storm in Mark 4:35-41.
